title: Kenai Fjords National Park: Guided Hiking
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things to Do     Outfitters and Guides     Guided Hiking                Guided Hiking       These companies lead groups for all experience levels on trips ranging from short hikes around Exit Glacier to longer hikes on the Harding Icefield trail and nearby areas. Companies in this category typically offer day hikes only. Multi-day trips are usually found under backpacking or mountaineering.        NPS Photo  Adventure Sixty North P.O.
